history.narrative: Law 13-121, the “Long-Term Care Insurance Act of 2000,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-246, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 4, 2000, and February 1, 2000, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 23, 2000, it was assigned Act No. 13-287 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-121 became effective on May 23, 2000.
